title: Who do you think can bench press more? Ornn or Braum
body: Who could bench press more {{champion:201}}  or {{champion:516}} ?

replies.body:
I feel like this question is like those "Which is more intelligent - a dog or a cat?" questions.  The dog is highly intelligent, able to be trained, understands certain words, etc. etc.  The cat, well, we just can't be sure because they refuse to do the tests.

So my thoughts on it are:

Braum can bench press a LOT.
Ornn refuses to participate in your silly competition.

{{champion:420}} "I do not challenge you, I bring you the test!"

Illaoi is a cat confirmed. Mewaoi.

> [{quoted}](name=Bubbaman73,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7VF5cP7Y,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2017-09-15T21:33:04.493+0000)
>
> {{champion:420}} "I do not challenge you, I bring you the test!"
> 
> Illaoi is a cat confirmed. Mewaoi.

A test...and also this dead Twitch. I already gave his spirit to Nagakabouros and sold his crossbow on E-bay. ENJOY!
{{sticker:cass-cry}}  (added sticker just because)

> [{quoted}](name=Bioluminescence,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7VF5cP7Y,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-09-15T19:33:12.830+0000)
>
> I feel like this question is like those "Which is more intelligent - a dog or a cat?" questions.  The dog is highly intelligent, able to be trained, understands certain words, etc. etc.  The cat, well, we just can't be sure because they refuse to do the tests.
> 
> So my thoughts on it are:
> 
> Braum can bench press a LOT.
> Ornn refuses to participate in your silly competition.

While true, I think we can also answer this one with ***Ornn*** pretty handily. We can't directly test a dog and a cat because, as you said, cats won't let themselves be tested, but Ornn is literally a demigod and, it seems, an inordinately strong one able to headbutt giant elemental rams so hard they fly in the opposite direction.

I feel like from a purely in-lore standpoint Ornn wins, even if its not by as much as he'd expect. :P
Ornn has the advantage of being able to build more benches as he presses.

Who can bench press more? A human (possibly iceborn) with extraordinary strength or a 30 FT TALL PRIMORDIAL DEMIGOD OF FIRE?

Gee, I don't know!

> [{quoted}](name=XIII Vanitas,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=7VF5cP7Y,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2017-09-15T22:14:48.833+0000)
>
> Who can bench press more? A human (possibly iceborn) with extraordinary strength or a 30 FT TALL PRIMORDIAL DEMIGOD OF FIRE?
> 
> Gee, I don't know!

To be fair, Braum bitch slapped a hole into a mountain cause the enchanted door was unbreakable.
ORNN HEADBUTTED THE FRELJORD MOUNTAINS INTO EXISTENCE.
The real question is: Can Braum bench press Ornn?
I'd kind of like to see Poppy arm wrestling Ornn or Braum, because it would be pretty funny seeing this giant, muscled guy struggling against a 3-foot tall midget.
I like to imagine Braum has some super mysterious powers so I'm gonna go with Braum.
